metadata.category: Building an AI Image Generation App with ImagePlayground
metadata.title: Style Selection

inlineContent.text: Learn about the various image styles provided by ImagePlayground
and how to select them appropriately.
the visual style of the generated image.
Each style has unique visual characteristics,
and it’s important to choose a style that fits your app’s purpose.
Let’s examine each case of the ImagePlaygroundStyle enumeration.
You can specify an initial style when presenting the sheet.
Users can change to a different style within the sheet if they wish.
Here’s an example of creating a character with Animation style.
Animation style is effective for facial expressions or emotions.
Illustration style is effective for information delivery.
It can be used for concept art or visual explanations.
The Sketch style generates natural sketches
Black and white or limited colors
Sketch style is suitable for artistic expression.
It can be used for visualization
Choose a style that matches your app’s nature and purpose.
Letting users choose the style is also a good approach.
Here’s a UI example that provides style selection options to users.
You can dynamically determine the default style based on app context.
Animation style creates warm and friendly characters
making it suitable for children’s apps.
While Sketch is good for artistic expression,
Animation is more friendly for children.
but Animation is more suitable for character-focused content.
What is the most suitable style for generating character images
The initial style is just a suggestion,
It’s fixed to the initial style and cannot be changed.
Users can freely change to other styles within the sheet.
The initial style is just a starting point,
and users can change to any style they prefer.
Only styles allowed by the app developer can be selected.
There’s no API for developers to restrict styles.
What is the user’s selection authority after specifying

from ImagePlayground in your app.
